document_name: Decree-Law no. 4/2018 on incentives to electric mobility
document_description: This Decree-Law creates an incentive to promote the replacement of fossil fuels with electricity for the supply of municipal public passenger transport vehicles. The regime provided for in this decree-law expires on December 31, 2025.The price of electric energy used in the supply of electric vehicles for the municipal and intermunicipal public passenger transport service and for the activity of collecting undifferentiated waste and recyclable materials is subject to a discount. This discount will be revised every couple of years.
